action_description: This action will turn off the selected switch.
This action will open the selected garage door.
This action will turn on the selected switch.
This action will lock the selected lock.
This action will unlock the selected lock.
This action will toggle the selected switch from On to Off or Off to On.
This action will change your abode system to the selected system mode.
This action will close the selected garage door.
This action will apply the selected abode Quick Action.
This action will change the dimmer to the selected percentage.
